Major_Arcs.title: King Guz, Bronto, and Dinosaur Dealership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows King Guz's near drowning and debt accusation, transitions to Bronto's bumping problem and Alley Oop's consideration of trading in his old dinosaur for a new one at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Rescue and Debt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers King Guz's drowning and rescue by Alley, followed by Guz accusing Alley of an unpaid debt and a revelation of Guz faking the drowning.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Bumping Problem and Diagnosis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Alley Oop's dinosaur Bronto bumping into trees, Alley's confusion, and Dinny's diagnosis of Bronto's condition due to old age and mileage.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In and Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the suggestion to trade in Bronto, the introduction of Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership, and Alley Oop's initial evaluation of a smaller dinosaur.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Purchase and Farewell
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley Oop's experience at the dinosaur dealership, including a test drive, purchasing a new dinosaur, and the sentimental farewell to his old dinosaur, Pal.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Deal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the salesman offering a test drive, the test drive itself, a mishap during the test, and the finalization of the deal despite the accident.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Dinosaur Size and Taking a Test Drive
Test Drive Mishap and Securing the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Sad Dinosaur and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the sad reaction of the old dinosaur and the sentimental farewell between Alley Oop and his old dinosaur Pal, culminating in Pal being priced for sale.

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur and Identity Reveal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's first ride on his new dinosaur and transitions to a scene where a dinosaur is being sold, culminating in a surprising identity reveal during a test ride.

sub_scenes.title: First Ride on New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop starting a journey with his new, smaller dinosaur, Dinny, and being advised to handle it cautiously.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Identity Twist
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a dinosaur sales pitch, a test ride, and a surprising revelation where a fallen rider's roar reveals his identity as 'Dinny'.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny's mistreatment by a caveman with a club, Dinny's escape on a dinosaur, and the ensuing chase involving children.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Harassment and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the mistreatment of Dinny by a caveman with a club, Dinny's complaints, and his eventual escape on a dinosaur.

Major_Arcs.title: Cooola and Alley's Relationship Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the relationship conflict between Alley and Cooola, starting with a fishing invitation and rejection, leading to an argument and a sudden, mysterious consequence.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Argument
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Alley inviting Cooola fishing, her rejection, and the subsequent argument where Cooola accuses Alley of taking her for granted.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Being Taken for Granted

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Noise Complaints and Romantic Pursuit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to fishing-related humor with noise complaints and then to a romantic rivalry scenario, including jealousy, physical altercation, and romantic choice.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Noise and Complaints
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts cavemen fishing and complaining about noise, culminating in a confrontation and a request for silence.

narrative_arcs.title: The Noisy Baiting and Fishing Disturbance
Confrontation, Silence Request, and Woman Comparison

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Rivalry and Choice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a romantic rivalry involving Oola, a woman, and another man, depicting suspicion, observation, and the woman's positive response to Oola's advances, leading to a jealous outburst and romantic resolution on page 11.

Major_Arcs.title: Pozy's Romantic Misadventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Pozy's attempts to win back Cherie, starting with learning about 'romance', mimicking Koko's romantic gestures, and culminating in a disastrous attempt to present flowers.

sub_scenes.title: Learning Romance and Mimicry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Pozy learning about 'romance' as a strategy and deciding to mimic Koko by offering flowers to Cherie.

sub_scenes.title: Botanical Blunder and Backfire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Pozy's disastrous flower offering, involving a crocodile and resulting in Cherie's disgust and Pozy's realization of his failure.

Major_Arcs.title: Flashback and Finger Bite
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc consists of a flashback revealing the muscular man's possessiveness and a humorous resolution involving a finger bite misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Flashback and Possessiveness
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a flashback showing the muscular man's jealousy and possessiveness, followed by a dialogue with Koko in a cave further emphasizing these traits.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation, Attack, and Finger Bite Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts an outdoor confrontation, a sudden 'cannibal' attack, and the humorous reveal that the 'attack' was actually a finger bite during a romantic gesture.

Major_Arcs.title: Various Relationship Conflicts and Alley's Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases a series of relationship conflicts, including infidelity accusations, marital disputes, and culminates in Alley's romantic transformation and the confusion of fishing men.

sub_scenes.title: Assorted Relationship Conflicts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a series of panels depicting various relationship conflicts, including accusations of infidelity and physical retaliation in marital disputes.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Romantic Transformation and Fishing Men's Confusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley's decision to become romantic, his declaration to Oola, and his first attempt at romantic gestures, observed with confusion by fishing men.

Major_Arcs.title: The Perils of the 'Twist' Dance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores the dangers and social pressures surrounding a new dance craze called 'the twist', showing injuries, generational gap, social challenge, and romantic rejection due to poor dancing.

sub_scenes.title: Twist Dance Injuries and Generational Gap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'twist' dance and its immediate consequence: injuries, followed by commentary on older generations attempting new dances.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Challenge and Romantic Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a cavewoman challenging a caveman to dance, followed by another cavewoman inviting a caveman to dance, but ultimately rejecting him due to his poor dance skills.

Major_Arcs.title: Dance Lessons and Humorous Identity Reveal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a caveman's decision to take dance lessons, his clumsy lesson experience, and a comedic reveal of the dance instructor's true identity.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Studio and Clumsy Lesson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a caveman entering a dance studio, inquiring about 'the twitch' lesson, and experiencing a series of clumsy and painful dance attempts.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dance Studio and the Challenge

sub_scenes.title: Instructor's Real Identity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the comedic twist that 'Miss Floog' is actually the caveman himself, Miss Glump.

Major_Arcs.title: 'Twitch' Dance Performance and Unexpected Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley-Oop's 'twitch' dance performance, the audience's mockery, his reaction, and the surprising twist that injuries occurred not from doing the dance, but from watching it.

sub_scenes.title: 'Twitch' Dance and Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley-Oop starting his 'twitch' dance performance and facing mockery and laughter from the audience.

narrative_arcs.title: Humiliation Through Laughter During the Dance

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Overwhelmed by Dance Viewers
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the unexpected consequence of Alley-Oop's dance: a hospital overwhelmed with patients injured from watching 'the twitch'.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Spain Research and Romantic Interlude
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows scholars planning to use a time machine for research in 16th-century Spain and then reveals Alley-Oop's actual activities in the past are more romantic than scholarly.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine for Spain Research
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts scholars discussing the need for firsthand information on 16th-century Spain and deciding to use a time machine to send Alley-Oop to gather facts.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking First-Hand Information on Ancient Spain via Time Machine

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Encounter in the Past
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals that years later, Alley-Oop is in ancient Spain, engaged in a romantic encounter rather than historical research.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishaps and Spain Bullfight Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details time machine mishaps leading to Alley-Oop and Oola's unexpected transportation, their return to ancient Spain, and Alley-Oop's accidental bullfighting career.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Alley-Oop's attempt to get a kiss from Oola, the time machine activation, and their unexpected transportation to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Persistent Kiss Request and Reluctant Agreement
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Arrival in the Time Machine and Explanation

sub_scenes.title: Return to Spain and Bullfight Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley-Oop and Oola's arrival in the 20th century, Wonmug's explanation of their assignment in Spain, and their immediate return to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Wonmug's Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Oola's Role
Arrival in Spain and Initial Banter

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Bullfight and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley-Oop's unconventional bullfighting style using a stone hammer and the crowd's positive reaction to it.

Major_Arcs.title: Return from Spain and Interrupted Kiss (Again)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley-Oop's return from Spain, the promised kiss, and its humorous interruption due to a jealous misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Return and Promised Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the setup for Alley-Oop's return, praise for his bravery in Spain, and the woman reminding him of the promised kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Bravery in Spain and a Kiss Promise

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Accusation and Lesson Learned
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the interrupted kiss scenario with a jealous accusation and Alley-Oop humorously concluding he will never get kissed.

Major_Arcs.title: 'King for a Day' and Misinterpreted Respect
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous concept of 'King for a Day', focusing on a king's temporary departure, the appointment of a temporary king, and a darkly comedic misunderstanding of 'respect'.

sub_scenes.title: 'King for a Day' Introduction and Challenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept, the crowned king's perceived easy job, and his decision to temporarily appoint another king.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day Introduction and Initial Rule

sub_scenes.title: Misinterpreted Respect and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the crowned king's departure announcement, the darkly humorous misinterpretation of 'respect' as rock-throwing, and the aftermath with the crowned king's return to power.

Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Ulcer Pills and Dirty Feet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts King Guz's mistaken consumption of ulcer pills, his dirty feet causing Queen Oompa's anger, and his eventual understanding of why King Guz takes vacations.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Pills and Dirty Feet Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers King Guz mistaking ulcer pills for bon-bons and then being scolded by Queen Oompa for having dirty feet on her clean floor.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification

Major_Arcs.title: King's Disputes and Dining Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts various troubles faced by a king, including settling disputes, financial disagreements with his advisor, and being served ulcer-aggravating food at dinner, ending in a violent outburst.

sub_scenes.title: Resolving Disputes and Financial Frustration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the king intervening in two disputes - a spear-throwing cheating accusation and a money fight - and then specifically resolving a clam ownership dispute with the help of a wise man.

sub_scenes.title: Dining Displeasure and Violent Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the king's initial delight with dinner turning into anger over ulcer-aggravating food, followed by a playful interruption by a servant leading to a violent reaction from the king.

Major_Arcs.title: Royalty, Rulership, and Strange Duck Measurement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contains a mix of scenes related to royalty and leadership, including an apology related to job stress, relief from rulership, an offer to become ruler, and a bizarre scene involving measuring for a 'Strange Duck'.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Relief from Rulership, and Rule Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents an apology between cavemen, followed by a caveman expressing relief at leaving a ruler position, and then another caveman being offered the role of ruler.

sub_scenes.title: Strange Duck Measurement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a bizarre scenario of cavemen measuring 6 feet in relation to a 'Strange Duck', the purpose of which is unclear.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Prophecy and Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contrasts a romantic prophecy with the abrupt and humorous reality of the prophesied 'handsome, bearded stranger' being forcibly shaved.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Prophecy and Anticipation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up a romantic scenario with a woman receiving a prophecy about meeting a handsome, bearded stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving of the 'Handsome Stranger'
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene humorously subverts the romantic expectation by depicting the 'handsome, bearded stranger' being abruptly captured and forcibly shaved at a tonsorial parlor.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishap and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with a time machine malfunction, resulting in a Roman soldier appearing instead of 'Oop', adding a final humorous and unexpected twist.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a man preparing to use a time machine to bring 'Oop' to the present, but the experiment goes wrong, resulting in a Roman soldier appearing and the machine breaking down.
